p: In view of that Nanning City located close to to Vietnam and Guizhou, and share similar environmental conditions and mosquito distributions, our research revealed and supported that ZIKV infections existed in Nanning City, which strongly suggested that ZIKV epidemic areas have already extended to most of the areas between the northern part of Southeast Asian countries and Nanning City ( Fig 3) . Hence, our study not only reported that distribution of ZIKV in China is endemic but also broadened the area of ZIKV epidemic regions and supported the ZIKV distribution model in East and Southeast Asia [ 15, 16].
